title: Less Than Week To The Deadline, As Many As 1500 Americans Are Still In Afghanistan
content:
1. Less Than Week To The Deadline, As Many As 1500 Americans Are Still In Afghanistan  NPR
  2. US President Biden maintains withdrawal deadline as the Taliban block Kabul airport access | DW News  DW News
  3. Secretary Blinken puts a number on Americans currently stuck in Afghanistan  Fox News
  4. Opinion | The Afghan Army Collapsed Against the Taliban. Here’s Why.  The New York Times
  5. What you need to know about the chaotic U.S. departure from Afghanistan | Trudy Rubin  The Philadelphia Inquirer

localize.title: 締め切りまで1週間を切りましたが、1500人ものアメリカ人がまだアフガニスタンに滞在しています。
距离最后期限不到一周，仍有多达1500名美国人在阿富汗。
距離最後期限不到一週，仍有多達1500名美國人在阿富汗。
